snippet: After the Nationals ensured that he was not experiencing concussion-like symptoms from being kneed in the head in the opener, Bryce Harper played and went 0 for 4.
abstract: Washington Nationals outfielder Bryce Harper, who was kneed in the head in the season opener, looks impressive in the field during 5-1 victory over New York Mets.
lead_paragraph: After the Nationals ensured that he was not experiencing concussion-like symptoms from being kneed in the head in the opener, Bryce Harper played and went 0 for 4.

headline.main: Passing Concussion Tests, Harper Returns to Lineup
headline.print_headline: Passing Concussion Tests, Harper Returns to Lineup
